text: Linda Larkin (born March 20, 1970) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as the speaking voice of Princess Jasmine in Disney's 1992 animated movie Aladdin. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Linda Larkin at the Disney Legends Website Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Linda Larkin
